articles.title: Adam Rich, former 'Eight Is Enough' child star, dies at 54 - The Associated Press - en Español
articles.description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — Adam Rich, the child actor with a pageboy mop-top who charmed TV audiences as “America’s little brother” on “Eight is Enough,” has died. He was 54.  Rich died Saturday at his home in the Brentwood section of Los Angeles, said Lt.
articles.content:

articles.title: 'Three Amigos' gather this week in Mexico City to talk North American excellence - World News - Castanet.net
articles.description: Familiar North American irritants — U.S. protectionism, intransigence on continental trade, irregular migration — return to the fore this week as the so-called "Three Amigos" meet for a trilateral summit in Mexico City.

articles.author: Sarah Wulf Hanson, University of Washington, Theo Vos, University of Washington, The Conversation
articles.title: Long COVID stemmed from mild cases of COVID-19 in most people, according to a new multicountry study - DC News Now | Washington, DC
articles.description: Even mild COVID-19 cases can have major and long-lasting effects on people’s health. That is one of the key findings from our recent multicountry study on long COVID-19 – or long COVID – recently published in the Journal of the American Medical Association.

articles.title: Novak Djokovic fights back to defeat Sebastian Korda in Adelaide International final - ABC News
articles.description: After saving championship point against American Sebastian Korda, Novak Djokovic wins the men's final in a tight three-setter as his Australian Open preparation gathers pace.
articles.content:
Novak Djokovic has saved a match point on his way to beating world number 33 Sebastian Korda in an epic Adelaide International final at Memorial Drive.
